description:
Simple yet effective, this manual pump takes the lung-work out of inflating your MEC VectAir Sleeping Pad.

  • Fabric is abrasion-resistant polyester with internal TPU laminate
  • Welded seams keep it air tight
  • Internal open cell foam expands and contracts to trap air as you pump
  • Packed dimensions are 22 x 22 x 8.5 cm
name: MEC VectAir Pump
